trial</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_OTRIAL_S'><xf:label>If yes, will she still be participating in this trial one week after delivery?</xf:label><xf:item trial</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_MOVE'><xf:label>Q13_Does she intend to move out of the area of the study in the next year?</xf:label><xf:item area</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_PMTCT'><xf:label>Is she included in a PMTCT program?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item complying with study procedures? (probe according to SOP)</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item><xf:hint>Comply with study procedures</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_ELIG'><xf:label>Based on the screening procedures and questions so far: Is the mother eligible for further participation</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item><xf:hint>Eligibility</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_DELIVERY'><xf:label>Mother related - Where does she intend to deliver?</xf:label><xf:hint>Site of planned delivery</xf:hint></xf:input><xf:select1 bind='I_MSA1_MSA1_CONSELLING'><xf:label>Is she willing to accept infant feeding option counselling from a designated research counsellor?</xf:label><xf:item id='0'><xf:label>No</xf:label><xf:value>0</xf:value></xf:item><xf:item id='1'><xf:label>Yes</xf:label><xf:value>1</xf:value></xf:item><xf:hint>Accept counselling</xf:hint></xf:select1><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_IDPAT'><xf:label>Patient ID</xf:label><xf:hint>Patient ID</xf:hint></xf:input><xf:input bind='I_MSA1_ID'><xf:label>Patient ID</xf:label><xf:hint>Patient ID</xf:hint></xf:input></xf:group></xf:xforms>
